channel.title: Development Of DamoScape
channel.description:
[img]http://i27.tinypic.com/2mqnqbl.gif[/img]
Hey everyone on MoparScape forums and i like to show you my work on my server and it was easy coding but please be nice and respect me because i am still learning the coding skills!
Server ip - damoscape.servegame.com Server Port - 43594
My forums is [url=http://www.moparscape99.smfforfree3.com]www.moparscape99.smfforfree3.com[/url]
I started coding at the start of this year and everything is new to me and i love coding but i am looking for more coding people and if you like to be on the Development Team Of DamoScape.. Then this is the topic for you!!!
Owners - Mod Damo (In Game Name - Damo) ~~ 1337Alex ~~ (In Game Name - 1337Alex)
Co-Owners - Kanapk Dbowjaap22 I K0 Range
I give away Mods to people if you be good and earn it and follow my rules.
Admin Commands In Game - ::master ::pickup ::skillcapes (Mods can do this command)
Mods Commands In Game - ::mod (Talk To Mods And Admin Private) Players Commands In Game - ::starter (20mill and 1 Whip) ::food (9.9k cooked mantas rays) ::yell (Talk To Everyone In The Yell)
[u]DamoScape Client[/u] I am making a Client and you will be seeing prayer icons and pking skulls!
In Game Pictures! I am just going to put my pictures down and you can tell me if it is ok.
Home! [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2dvmupx.jpg[/img]
Skill Capes Shop (I am adding my skill capes) [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2e3n2ir.jpg[/img]
Hang Out Spot! [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/wbrznb.jpg[/img]
Seers Teleport! (Woodcut Here and Firemaking and much much more! [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/25tywb5.jpg[/img]
Dragons Teleport! (Drop Rares and Dragon Bones and Hides) [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2911e3c.jpg[/img]
Pking (Edge's Madness) [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2u7sw2d.jpg[/img]
Heronic Training (Heaps Of Great monsters here and drops) [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/a5bzew.jpg[/img]
Shops (The Home Of Shopping) [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/ipmuyp.jpg[/img]
Kill Heros and Moss Giants! (Great Drops Here) [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/6s5anb.jpg[/img]
Kill Jad and Dad and Hellhounds For Great Drops! [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2qm2eyx.jpg[/img]
I hope you like my server and i hope i see on my Coding List!
Coding List -Damo (me) -1337Alex - - -
Staff List (I need Staff For my server and Staff gets Admin To look after my server) - - - - -
I hope you like my topic and please post good stuff.
thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2008, 10:50:56 PM[/size][hr]Please tell me if i did a good job. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Do not advertise forums.[/center]

item.title: Development Of DamoScape
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Can you read the PM i sent you please =)
Also not bad job ^^
And goodluck in the future updates
Also you shouldnt advertise your server ip because your topic could get locked for advertiseing you should really put something like
“If you want to test out my server pm me and ill pm you my server” just a suggestion to save this topic from getting locked most topics ive seen advertiseing there server usually gets locked

Read full topic

Hey everyone on MoparScape forums and i like to show you my work on my server and it was easy coding but please be nice and respect me because i am still learning the coding skills!
